question: |Exercise!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!?
question_content: with a 2hr exercise(HARD EXERCISE)an hr pilats and an hr bike for 7 days a week(everyday) how much will i lose and when will get thinner also will these help slim my thighs?

answers.answer_content:
to actually see good results it takes a fair while, like 6-8 weeks, thats why so many people quit fitness programs. you just have to have patience. i recommend not doing the bike ride everyday, maybe only 3 days a week, because you will become very low on glycogen levels if it is an hour bike ride. after a few weeks, you should notch it up to 4 or 5 sessions a week if you really want to get fit quick. as for the thighs, that will help, to slim thighs it is better to do aerobic work, like big jogs or bike rides, not big leg weights, because that just adds muscle to the thigh, making them look bigger.
hope i helped
